story.author: SmartieWrites

msg.content: -=Welcome To Josh And Isa!=- From this main menu, you can change options, enable debugging, or you know... START THE STORY. I hope you enjoy!
~Settings~ From here, you can do stuff. And change stuff around. Interesting, huh?

<>AutoTrack<> You're probably here to get a specific ending, right? I understand! I'll even help you! Just choose the ending you want, then let AutoTrack do the rest. It'll be like you're reading a one-track story!
NOTE AutoTrack does not currently work with this version of Josh and Isa.
AutoTrack has been enabled!
AutoTrack has been disabled!
{}Debug Enabled!{}
{}Debug Disabled!{}
•••DEBUG STATS••• AutoTrack: %auto% Debug: %debug% Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret%

reply.content: Ugh... It's so hard to see out here...

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,1000,I still remember that December...,!SpLiT!,1500,The one where I met her.

reply.content: Coming out here was a mistake...

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,3000,Sometimes I wonder what would've changed if she never showed up at all.,!SpLiT!,2000,Would I even still be here?

reply.content: Ah, sorry! I'll help pick that up...

msg.content: Haha, it's fine! Even I can barely see two feet in front of me in this storm.

reply.content: Again, sorry. I wasn't looking where I was going and-

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I remember when I first saw her, I was...,!SpLiT!,2000,Well, love at first sight, right?,!SpLiT!,500,Her smile...,!SpLiT!,200,...

msg.content: Like I said, it's fine!
I'm Isa, by the way. Isa Latem.
Are you lost?

reply.content: Huh? Oh, yeah, I'm a bit lost...

msg.content: Well, if you want, you could hang out at my house until this storm calms down. It's just a couple blocks away.

reply.content: Yeah, that'd be great, thank you!
I'd rather go back to my house...

msg.content: Alright, then, follow me!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,2000,So then, I started walking with Isa.,!SpLiT!,2000,I don't know how she knew where to go, but...,!SpLiT!,1000,We made it to her house.,!SpLiT!,2000,Eventually.

msg.content: Ah, here we are! Sorry that took so long.

reply.content: It's fine. Really. I'm surprised you even knew where to go.

msg.content: Trust me, I know the layout of this town like the back of my hand.
So, hey, you know my name. Do you mind if I ask yours?

reply.content: I'm Josh, nice to meet you.

msg.content: Why were you out in the storm?
Don't wanna talk about it? That's fine!
Oh, I gotta go. Be right back!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I didn't know what would happen next.,!SpLiT!,2000,The future always holds something new.,!SpLiT!,2000,But I did know one thing.,!SpLiT!,3500,A new story was beginning.

msg.content: Oh, that's fine! Where do you live?
@expr+You look around, trying to find a relative direction to your house...
@expr+But to no avail.
Well, shouldn't be too far, right?

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2500,I didn't know how long I was walking for.,!SpLiT!,2000,My house could be really far away.,!SpLiT!,3500,It could be all the way on the other side of the world. I don't know.,!SpLiT!,300,...

msg.content: Ah, don't worry. I'm sure I can find it. You know the address, right?

reply.content: How would you be able to find it in this storm?

msg.content: I know this town like the back of my hand, no worries!
@expr+You tell Isa where you live.
Hey, I know where that is!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I don't know how, but...,!SpLiT!,2000,...she did find my house.,!SpLiT!,2000,Eventually.

msg.content: Here we are! This is your house, right?
No problem. Oh! Before I go...

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,Isa hands you a slip of paper

msg.content: Take this!
Yep! Figured we'd keep in touch, now that we're friends.
Yeah, aren't we friends?
Great! I'll see you later, then!

chapter.chdesc: Jack has a few things to say.

msg.content:
°•.Debug Stats.•° AutoTrack: %auto% Debug: %debug% Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret%
~=Misc Variables=~ Visit: %visit%
[]Media Used In This Chapter[] None!
Well, shit, you're using all caps. This must be important. I'm listening! Or... reading.
You think you fell in love?

reply.content: I don't know what it feels like.

msg.content: Alright, alright, so who is it?

reply.content: Isa Latem! At least, that's what she told me her name was...

msg.content: Isa Latem, huh?
I don't think I've ever heard that name before. Does she go to our school?
You're not sure?
Well, as long as she doesn't actually live in like Europe or something, that'd be a hard relationship to maintain.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,1500,Jack wasn't exactly a love guru, but...,!SpLiT!,2000,He was once in a long-distance relationship.,!SpLiT!,3000,They talked over everything. Snapchat, Twitter, Facebook, you get the idea.,!SpLiT!,3500,One day, she just stopped talking to him. It didn't take him long to figure out why that was.,!SpLiT!,2500,He's held an opinion for long-distance relationships ever since.

msg.content: Neato!
Anyways...
How'd you meet her?

reply.content: We met in the storm yesterday! I got a bit lost...

msg.content: The storm? You were out in that? And she was, too?

reply.content: Yeah, I meant to just take a walk, but I ended up losing since of where I was. As for Isa, I don't really know why she was out there...

msg.content: Man, you can't help but get lost, huh?
Remember when you got lost in that field trip years ago?
Well, I'm glad to hear you fell in love.
Anyways, I gotta go, but I'll see you... well, next year, huh? I can't believe it's already almost 2016...

reply.content: Yeah, this year flew by pretty quickly.
This wasn't exactly one of my best years, I honestly just can't wait for it to be over.

msg.content: To each their own, I guess.
See ya!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,You know, it's like this every year.,!SpLiT!,2000,New Year's Eve. I'm always in my room.,!SpLiT!,2500,Maybe because I don't really know where else to go.,!SpLiT!,4000,The only things we ever really make a deal about are Christmas, birthdays, and Thanksgiving. But the thing is...,!SpLiT!,2000,You grow out of those over time.,!SpLiT!,1000,Just like I have.

msg.content: Hey, Josh!
Nothing much, just helping set up things before the ball drops.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I've heard of the ball drop.,!SpLiT!,2000,But I haven't heard much of it.

msg.content: Yeah. You do watch the ball drop, right?
Wait, do you really not watch the ball drop? Why not?

reply.content: My family doesn't celebrate New Year's, so every year, I'm in my room, and I don't really get to see-

msg.content: Whoa, stop right there. That's all I needed to hear.
Oh, I know! Why not come over to my house? I'm sure my family wouldn't mind me having a guest over.

reply.content: R-really? You'd let me come over just to watch some ball drop?

msg.content: It's not just "some ball", it's- well, you'll see! So whaddya say?
Sweet! I'll see you there, then!

condition.then: FADE_MSG,1,After that, I snuck out of my house through the window, and went to Isa's.

msg.content: So you've really never celebrated New Year's?
Hmmm...

reply.content: My family is a bit different... we don't do a lot of stuff that normal families do.

msg.content: So I guess you miss out on a lot?
What about your friends? Don't they ever invite you over?
You okay?

reply.content: I don't usually spend time with anybody outside of school. I usually keep to myself.

msg.content: Well, hey, you're spending time with me!

reply.content: Haha, yeah, I guess that's true...

msg.content: I must be somebody special, huh? Haha.

reply.content: (Oh, trust me. You don't even know the half of it...)

msg.content: Come on, we should get going. The ball will be dropping soon!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,700,3!,!SpLiT!,700,2!,!SpLiT!,700,1!,!SpLiT!,1000,Happy New year's!,!SpLiT!,5000,As soon as the ball hits the ground, fireworks go off in Times Square. While in Isa's house, people are cheering, clinking glasses, and using noisemakers.,!SpLiT!,2000,How can anybody handle this much noise?,!SpLiT!,2000,Somebody hands me a noisemaker, and I spin it.,!SpLiT!,1000,It's pretty fun.,!SpLiT!,2000,Soon I jump in with the cheering and noise making.
RT_SET_STAT,You are getting ready to leave

msg.content: Hey, Josh!

reply.content: Oh, hey Isa. I gotta get going.

msg.content: Well, lemme ask a few questions first! Did you have fun?
I was hoping so! Secondly...
How much do you know about New Year's and it's traditions?

reply.content: Before I came here, all I knew was there's a ball, it signals a new year, annnnnnd that's about it.

msg.content: So you don't know about the New Year's kiss?

reply.content: The heck is that? Is it supposed to be a different from a normal kiss?

msg.content: Ah, uh.. nevermind! Forget I said anything! I'll see you soon.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,3000,I managed to slip back into my house without anybody noticing.,!SpLiT!,500,...,!SpLiT!,1000,A new year's kiss...,!SpLiT!,2000,Now, why would she bring that up?

msg.content: ^•√DEBUG STATS√•^ Debug: %debug% AutoTrack: %auto% Visit: %visit% Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret%
Good morning! If you're awake yet...
Good to hear!

reply.content: Well, what do you wanna talk about?

msg.content: Nothing.

reply.content: Come on, Isa. It's 7:00 in the morning. Obviously you want to talk about something.

msg.content: Haha, guess you caught me.
Though I still don't know what to talk about...

reply.content: Well then, why don't we talk about...
Have you ever been in a relationship before?
Do you listen to any music?

msg.content: Can't say I have many hobbies... I guess I listen to music every now and then. But that's really about it.
What about you?

reply.content: Reading! I love it! It's amazing how a story can take you to a whole nother world. Most people just see it as words on a page or screen, but that means they haven't read it themselves!

msg.content: Really passionate about reading, huh?
Haha, anyways, what else should we talk about?
A relationship? Like, as in, love?
I've been in one, but it didn't last long.
I don't even remember her name, and she just had different feelings at one point.
Yeah, I used to be in a same-sex relationship.

reply.content: Well, that's interesting! I don't think I've ever actually met somebody who's gay.

msg.content: Well I'm not gay anymore lol. Anyways, what about you? Have you ever been in a relationship?

reply.content: Nope, though I have had a few crushes, I never really found the courage to tell them...

msg.content: Confessing is hard! It's so stressful, because you never know the other person's feelings...
Anything else to talk about?
Music... Yeah, I listen to it.
Mostly classical, it's very soothing.
What about you?

reply.content: I don't listen to a lot of music, but if I had to choose...
House. Especially progressive house. It always makes me happy!

msg.content: Ah, I've never really heard any songs in that genre.

reply.content: I'll be sure to show you my favorites sometime :)

msg.content: Same :)
Anything else?

reply.content: I can't really think of anything else to talk about...

msg.content: Ooh! I've got one!
Do you have a crush on anybody?
Ooh, I wonder who it is... mind telling me?
Figured as much, haha.

reply.content: What about you? Do you have a crush on anybody?

msg.content: Yep, but I'm not telling either.

reply.content: Well, I should probably get up from my bed now.

msg.content: Yeah, same.

reply.content: This was a good talk. I hope we can have a talk like this again sometime.

msg.content: I'll look forward to it :)

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I wish it could be like this every day.,!SpLiT!,2000,Isa gives me a feeling that nobody else does.,!SpLiT!,500,Is it love?,!SpLiT!,2000,I don't know, but I think it is.

chapter.chdesc: Despite everything, I still love her.

msg.content:
---DEBUG STATS--- Debug: %debug% AutoTrack: %auto% Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret%
...Misc Variables... Visit: %visit%
Yo, how's your thing with Isa going?

reply.content: I still haven't confessed to her.

msg.content: Why not?
Reasonable, confessing is hard.
What do you think she'd say if you confessed to her? Would she say yes?

reply.content: I mean, I can see her saying yes, but who knows...
I don't think she'll say yes... If anything, I think she'll say no.

msg.content: If you're confident, there shouldn't be a thing to worry about.
Well, you gotta be more confident than that.
So... when are you gonna tell her?

reply.content: I'm not. I don't think I'd be able to muster up enough courage.

msg.content: Like I said. If you're confident, there shouldn't be a problem.

reply.content: Things would be so much easier if I knew the chances...

msg.content: Sometimes it's better to not know the odds. Speaking from personal experience.

reply.content: That didn't help. Like, at all.

msg.content: Wasn't really supposed to.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,1000,Jack loved sharing facts.,!SpLiT!,1000,He's just that kind of person.,!SpLiT!,2000,Even when those facts don't help whatsoever.,!SpLiT!,2000,But, hey. It's what makes Jack... well, Jack.

msg.content: Alright maybe we should pick up this convo with some news!
First off, from the NY times...

reply.content: Jack, I appreciate the effort. But you know I can never pay attention to that stuff.

msg.content: Whoops, forgot.
See ya!

chapter.chdesc: insert heart emoji here nobody can read these descriptions anyways so

reply.content: Where is she? She was supposed to be here a few minutes ago...

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,Isa said she wanted to talk to me.,!SpLiT!,2000,But she didn't wanna say it through text.,!SpLiT!,2000,Not even through phone call.,!SpLiT!,2000,She wanted to say it face to face.

msg.content: Yeah, sorry I'm late...

reply.content: It's fine, really. I wasn't waiting too long.

msg.content: Haha, good to hear.

reply.content: So, you said that you wanted to talk to me about something? What is it?

msg.content: Ah! Um... It's...
Yeah, just... I... I...

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,There was another face of her's I'd never forget.,!SpLiT!,2500,The way she looked at me with those determined eyes.,!SpLiT!,2500,Just a second ago, she could barely get words out.,!SpLiT!,1000,And now...

msg.content: I love you!
D-do you love me?
Hahaha, you say that like I was supposed to know you'd say yes...

reply.content: Well, I'm not the best at words, so lemme try to say it some way else.

msg.content: Huh?

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,You land a kiss on Isa's lips.

msg.content: A-ah!
Yeah, it did...

reply.content: So I guess this means that we're a couple now, huh?

msg.content: Yep.
It feels nice.
Well, I've got a piano lesson to get to, so...

reply.content: Oh yeah, I nearly forgot you play piano, haha.

msg.content: Yeah, but before I go...

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,Isa hugs you, then kisses you.

msg.content: Okay, now I gotta go... See ya tomorrow?
Bye!

{✓}DEBUG STATS{✓} AutoTrack: %auto% Debug: %debug% Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret%
___Misc Vars___ Visit: %visit%
I'm gonna be honest, I never knew you played piano...
What? Then why did you say you wanted to play my piano?

reply.content: I thought maybe you could teach me.

msg.content: ...Why do you want to play piano?

reply.content: Well, because of you. You always have fun playing it.
I thought it would be a neat instrument to play.

msg.content: Because of me...?
I'd say it is.
@expr+Isa starts blushing.
Alright, I'll teach you.

reply.content: Alright, so what song should we start with?

msg.content: Well, we could start with my favorite... although, wait, that might be a bit too advanced...

reply.content: Come on, Isa! I'm sure I'll pick it up with your help.

msg.content: ...Alright, if you insist.

condition.then: SHOW_SNACK,1,Isa opens a music book to a page

msg.content: And... here we go!

reply.content: Oh yeah, that's a lot of notes, huh?

msg.content: Erm... yeah, I thought this would be too hard...
Wait! I have an idea!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,3000,I was a bit shocked when she suddenly grabbed my hands. But it started to make sense when she put my hands on the piano keys.

msg.content: Ready?

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,Isa guides your hands through the keys

msg.content: Alright, here we go...

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,1500,Playing a song with Isa was nice.,!SpLiT!,2000,And the way she moved my hands, like she was moving clouds...

msg.content: Doesn't really have a title, it's just a practice song.

reply.content: How did you get into piano?

msg.content: Didn't really have a choice. Once my parents put their mind to something for me, they kinda just jump right at it.
It is.
What do you mean?

reply.content: My family likes to make choices for me, too.

msg.content: Gets annoying, right?

reply.content: It used to be. But now it's just everyday life for me.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,3000,I knew I was supposed to be learning about the piano from this lesson.,!SpLiT!,2500,But at the time, Isa seemed much more significant.

reply.content: Wow. I knew you were good at piano, but I didn't know you were this good!

msg.content: It's what happens with years of practice.

reply.content: "Years"? How long have you been doing this?

msg.content: I've lost track.
Yeah?
I love you, too.
Are you getting bored?
I mean, you're not really getting to do much.

reply.content: How can I be bored when I'm with you?

msg.content: Stop it, you'll make me blush...

condition.then: SHOW_SNACK,2,Isa looks away, attempting to hide her blush

msg.content: A-ah!
You're not bored, that's all that matters...
Let's keep going.
Which part?
It is nice...
Don't make it weird, okay?
Th-that was a bit cheesy, don't you think?

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,Isa lets go of your hands

msg.content: Okay, I think that's all for today...

reply.content: I liked it. We should do it again sometime.

msg.content: We will, if you want to.
We can pick up on it again some other time.

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,Isa runs out of the room

msg.content: I gotta go, anyways. See ya!

chapter.real_talk_stat: You are sitting at a piano

msg.content:
--DEBUG STATS-- Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret% Debug: %debug% AutoTrack: %auto%
__Misc Variables__ Visit: %visit%
Hey, Josh!
You don't sound very excited to hear from me.
Not much, but doing good! How about you?
Is it because of Isa?
Relax! She's just going away for a month, remember?

reply.content: Yeah, you're right. It's just a month. Not too long.
I mean, a month is a pretty long time...

msg.content: That's the spirit!
Come on, cheer up.
Have you been able to contact her?

reply.content: Yeah, but she's always too busy. But that's what happens when you go to an art camp, huh?

msg.content: Can confirm. I remember when my sister went to an art camp. She never even texted us till she got on the plane!
Wasn't that she forgot about us. She was just busy. There's a lot that goes into art.

reply.content: Yeah, you have a point. Isa wouldn't forget me.
Thanks, Jack. I feel a bit better.

msg.content: We're always here for ya, Josh.
Always. That's what friends are for.

reply.content: How's everybody else doing? I've been so busy with Isa, I keep forgetting to spend time with you guys.

msg.content: Everyone's doing fine. We're all gonna go to that carnival on Saturday. Wanna come?

reply.content: Eh, I'm not too sure. We'll see.

msg.content: Alright, see ya then!

chapter.chdesc: You've really saved him, ya know?

msg.content:
--DEBUG STATS-- Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret% Debug: %debug% AutoTrack: %auto%
__Misc Variables__ Visit: %visit%
Depends. Who's this?
Alright, hold on. I'll add you to my contacts.
Okay, done. As you were saying?

reply.content: I wanted to talk about Josh.
Does he always fall in love that easily?

msg.content: Wouldn't say so. You're not his first crush, in case you're wondering. But you are his first relationship.
You really met him at the right time, ya know?
He's been dealing with a lot of problems at home recently.
I guess he really needed to know somebody loves him.
He changed a lot before you came around.
Do you know how he changed?

Before Josh met you, he changed a lot. He never wanted to talk to anyone, he was always keeping to himself, and he would have these random times where he would just space out.
Basically, we were losing him. He wasn't himself anymore. We all hated it, and we tried to change it. But everything that we tried just failed. Over and over.
But then you came around. When he met you, he was back to being his happy-go-lucky self. We all really need to thank you, if we haven't said it already.

reply.content: Ah, I see! Well, you're welcome. But no need to thank me, I just love Josh.
Yet still, do you have any idea why he fell in love with me when we first met?

msg.content: He didn't. It wasn't love at first sight. What Josh experienced at that time and what he's experiencing now are two different things.
He may not have fell in love at first sight, but he did see something in you. Which is saying something. He's never been very social, even when I first met him.

reply.content: But what was that thing he saw?

msg.content: That's something to ask Josh, not me.
No problem. But before you go, it's my turn to ask a question.
What do you love about Josh?

reply.content: Everything about him. Even his imperfections.
His personality. He has such a great attitude towards things.
I don't really know. But we love each other, and I think that's enough. Does love really need a reason?

msg.content: Well, imperfections make us human. And Josh is one of the most humane people I know.
He does. I agree with you on that.
Nah, I guess you're right.
Well, see you.

reply.content: See ya Jack. And tell Josh I'm on my way.

msg.content: Will do.

--DEBUG STATS-- Goodend: %goodend% Badend: %badend% Secret: %secret% Debug: %debug% AutoTrack: %auto%
__Misc Variables__ Visit: %visit%
Josh!
Yep! I am!
One of my friends is going camping up in the mountains during August, and she invited us!

reply.content: Wow, up in the mountains, huh?

msg.content: Yeah, the mountains. Don't tell me you have a fear of heights.
She couldn't really schedule any other month.

reply.content: Relax, Isa. I can handle heights just fine.
Relax, Isa. I love the mountains! They're very peaceful.

msg.content: So should I expect that you'll come?
Great! I can't wait!
Wait, Josh! Before you go...

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,You stop and turn to face Isa

msg.content: What did you see in me when we met?

reply.content: I don't know, really. But I had a feeling that you'd be there for me. That's love, right? Knowing you'll be there for someone in the most difficult of times, and knowing they'll be there for you?

msg.content: Something like that.

reply.content: How do you see love, Isa?

msg.content: Love is having a person that makes you happy. That cares for you. That will, well, help you. And you'd do all the same and more for them.

reply.content: That's a great way to see it.

msg.content: Yeah, I guess.

reply.content: Okay, well, I really gotta go. See ya later, love you!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,"Love you, too!",!SpLiT!,2000,I could hear Isa yell that through the hall.,!SpLiT!,2000,And that was the day I found my meaning for love.

chapter.real_talk_stat: Kids are running through the halls

msg.content:
фDEBUG STATSф goodend: %goodend% badend: %badend% secret: %secret% Debug: %debug% AutoTrack: %auto%
дMisc Variablesд Visit: %visit%
This is really peaceful.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I look over at Josh, who is smiling at the stars.,!SpLiT!,2000,I'm glad I met him, and that I've helped him.,!SpLiT!,1000,I really do love him.

msg.content: Look there. See it?

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,You look up at the stars

msg.content: That. There. The northern star.
Such a mystical thing, huh?
Think about it. It helps light the night sky. It directs sailors, and always leads you north. Even some people believe it's connected to Santa Claus. It's just so... unique.
Always leads north. Isn't that crazy?

reply.content: Nah, that doesn't sound too crazy.

msg.content: Hey, Isa?
Have you ever danced with someone under the stars?

reply.content: Can't say I have. What about you?

msg.content: Never even danced with someone before...

reply.content: Then why bring up the question?

msg.content: Cause I wanna dance under the stars with you.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,3000,I tried to look for an excuse that would hide the fact I'm a terrible dancer.

msg.content: Who says you need music?

reply.content: I mean, don't you need music to dance?

msg.content: No, of course you don't. I'll show you.
See? Just move to the sounds of nature.
Isn't it?

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,2000,We kept dancing. For maybe an hour or two.,!SpLiT!,2000,Then Josh tripped and fell down a small cliff.,!SpLiT!,2000,He took me with him. But I'm not complaining.,!SpLiT!,2000,I landed right on top of him.

msg.content: Ooh, that hurt...
Yeah, I'm fine.
I think so.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,It was then that I realized...

msg.content: Hey, why are you blushing?

reply.content: It's just... the way we're positioned.

msg.content: Huh? Oh...
Yeah...
B-but I've never done it before...!
W-well, if you want to...

===FINAL DEBUG RESULTS=== goodend: %goodend% badend: %badend% secret: %secret% AutoTrack: %auto% Debug: %debug%
^^Misc Variables that nobody cares about and I ended up never using Visit: %visit%
Thanks for playing Josh and Isa! All that's left is to see what ending you got...

chapter.real_talk_stat: You're sitting with Josh by the fire

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,We had set up a meeting, or date, whatever you wanna call it.,!SpLiT!,2000,It was supposed to be at 4:00.,!SpLiT!,2000,However, I got there early.,!SpLiT!,2000,...and I wish I hadn't.

reply.content: Alright, all that's left is to wait for Isa...

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,I heard some noises near me.,!SpLiT!,3000,I quickly hid in a bush, in case it wasn't Isa and was actually some criminal.,!SpLiT!,2000,You can never be too safe.,!SpLiT!,1500,...but, sure enough, it WAS Isa.,!SpLiT!,2000,And... she was with another guy.

msg.content: I love you, too, Jake.
Oh, you mean Josh? I wouldn't worry about him.
He's way too much of a softie. I don't think he'll ever get in an actual relationship.
Yeah, even his friends believe me.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,2000,At that point, I ran home, leaving a trail of tears behind me.,!SpLiT!,2000,I couldn't believe what I just saw.,!SpLiT!,2000,Isa was...,!SpLiT!,2000,...cheating on me...,!SpLiT!,3000,...and apparently, we weren't even in an active relationship.

msg.content: Hey, Josh? Can I talk with you?
You know how we've been dating for almost a year now?

reply.content: Closer than you'd think, cause I actually kept track

msg.content: Well, this is about our relationship.
It's something that's gonna be kind of hard to say, let alone text.
I think we should see other people.
Hello?

reply.content: Yep, knew that was gonna happen.
I can't believe I'm doing this...
But what choice do I have?

msg.content: You didn't mean that.

reply.content: Right, because you can read my emotions SO well. Fuck off.

msg.content: I obviously didn't know your emotions.
But you knew, huh? Everything?
You don't have to leave. You can stay here. We can still be friends.

reply.content: Friends. You mean, like, my friends? You know, the ones you lied to?

And what about me and my state? Did you ever think of that? No, of course you didn't. You're some stupid slut that kept me around as a plan B in case things went downhill for you. For. You. You don't love me. You never have. So shut up and listen. Not just to me, but to everything else you've ignored.
I fucking hate you, Isa Latem. You're the reason I had to get away from America. You're the reason I couldn't sleep for night after night. You're the reason I...
Come on, Tagami. I'm entrusting you.
No more stress. No more anxiety. Please.
Just give me a Welcoming January.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,2000,Josh and Isa by SmartieWrites,!SpLiT!,2000,Based on a true story.,!SpLiT!,9000,Dedications: MarinatedTuna - Helping me out since I started making Seen stories. Shikhar - Giving me motivation to actually finish this damn update Talestune - For making an inspiring story. Without them, this story wouldn't exist.,!SpLiT!,2000,Thanks for playing! You got the true ending.

chapter.real_talk_stat: You're on a train to Tagami.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,Me and Isa had set up a date.,!SpLiT!,2000,It was set to 4:00, but I got there early.

reply.content: Alright, all that's left is to wait for Isa.

msg.content: Oh, hey, Josh!
Didn't think I'd get done with my errands that quickly.

reply.content: Isa, when are you ever busy?

msg.content: You got me. I just wanted to surprise you.
Yep, they sure have.
Yeah, Josh?

reply.content: ...I'm gonna be a nervous mess when I ask this, but...

condition.then: RT_SET_STAT,You hold out a box to Isa.

msg.content: Yes! Of course I will!

condition.then: FADE_ADV,0,2000,Isa then hugged me tighter than ever before.,!SpLiT!,2000,Everything felt fine.,!SpLiT!,2000,Life finally felt right.,!SpLiT!,2000,...I love this.

msg.content: No, thank YOU, Josh!
I love you, too, Josh.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,2000,Josh and Isa by SmartieWrites,!SpLiT!,2000,You got the good ending.

msg.content: Josh? Are you okay? You haven't been coming to school recently.
Why not?
You're still thinking about her?

reply.content: I can't stop thinking about her.
Jack... What did I do wrong?

msg.content: I dunno, man. I really don't know. You two seemed perfect together.

reply.content: The way she broke up with me...
She just spilled everything. Saying we were never in a relationship in the first place... then just... leaving. With some guy.
I'm not okay. How can I be?

msg.content: Relax, Josh. Just snuggle in a blanket and calm down. It's cold out.
Why?

reply.content: I'm already outside, and I have no idea where I am.

msg.content: Are you insane? Get inside right now!

reply.content: There's no use, Jack. I'm in the middle of a forest.

msg.content: Find shelter! Do something! You can't stay outside!

reply.content: ...you've been a great friend. Never change.

msg.content: JOSH DON'T SAY THINGS LIKE THAT
JOSH?
dammit...
You're gone, aren't you?
You've been a great friend, too. See you some day, old friend.

condition.then: FADE_ADV,1,2000,Josh and Isa by SmartieWrites,!SpLiT!,2000,You got the bad ending.

story.desc:
NOTE THIS UPDATE IS IN BETA! PLEASE REPORT ANY BUGS OR SUGGESTIONS TO ME IN THE COMMENTS
Meet Josh, a lonely 18-year old who has lost control of his own life. After getting lost in a winter storm, he meets Isa Latem.
Will she be the one? Or will she break away?
-=Update Log=- ###v2.1(SW Current) - Bad version of AutoTrack implemented, but it works. Also, changed value of certain choices.
v2 - Choices! Choices! Choices! Life is full of choices, and now this story is, too!
In addition to choices, there are also two new endings, a main menu, and a COMPLETE rewrite.###
-=Contact Info=- ###I'll try to respond to comments on this story, but it won't be often. If you'd like to give feedback, you can contact me through:
Discord - SmartiePlays#5434 Twitter - SmartiePlaysYT Wattpad - SmartieWrites Reddit - SmartieYT###
Official prequel to the Welcoming January series. http://my.w.tt/UiNb/1xeVVeld2A
story.name: Josh And Isa
